00014 #ifndef BLACKADDER_H
00015 #define BLACKADDER_H
00016 
00017 #include "blackadder_defs.h"
00018 
00019 struct _ba_handle;
00020 typedef struct _ba_handle *ba_handle;
00021 
00022 typedef void *ba_event;
00023 
00024 /*
00025  * We use C macro magic to wrap the publish_*(), unpublish_*(),
00026  * subscribe_*() and unsubscribe_*() functions.
00027  *
00028  * The parameters for these functions, except for publish_data(),
00029  * are the same.
00030  *
00031  * ba_<[un]publish|[un]subscribe>_<scope|info>(
00032  *     ba_handle ba,
00033  *     const char *id, unsigned int id_len,
00034  *     const char *prefix_id, unsigned int prefix_id_len,
00035  *     unsigned char strategy,
00036  *     void *str_opt, unsigned int str_opt_len)
00037  *
00038  * ba_publish_data(
00039  *     ba_handle ba,
00040  *     const char *id, unsigned int id_len,
00041  *     unsigned char strategy,
00042  *     void *str_opt, unsigned int str_opt_len,
00043  *     void *data, unsigned int data_len
00044  */
00045 
00046 #define _BA_PARAMS                                                      \
00047     const char *id, unsigned int id_len,                                \
00048     const char *prefix_id, unsigned int prefix_id_len,                  \
00049     unsigned char strategy,                                             \
00050     void *str_opt, unsigned int str_opt_len
00051 
00052 #define _BA_PARAMS_DATA                                                 \
00053     const char *id, unsigned int id_len,                                \
00054     unsigned char strategy,                                             \
00055     void *str_opt, unsigned int str_opt_len,                            \
00056     void *data, unsigned int data_len
00057 
00058 #define _XX_BA_FUNC_DECL(ba_prefix, f_name)                             \
00059     void ba_prefix##_##f_name(ba_prefix##_handle ba, _BA_PARAMS)
00060 
00061 #define _XX_BA_FUNC_DECL_DATA(ba_prefix, f_name)                        \
00062     void ba_prefix##_##f_name(ba_prefix##_handle ba, _BA_PARAMS_DATA)
00063 
00064 #define _BA_FUNC_DECL(f_name)  _XX_BA_FUNC_DECL(ba, f_name)
00065 #define _BA_FUNC_DECL_DATA(f_name)  _XX_BA_FUNC_DECL_DATA(ba, f_name)
00066 
00067 #ifdef __cplusplus
00068 #define _XX_BA_FUNC_DEF(ba_prefix, ba_type, f_name)                     \
00069     extern "C" _XX_BA_FUNC_DECL(ba_prefix, f_name) {                    \
00070         ba_type *_ba = (ba_type *)ba->instance;                         \
00071         string _id (id, id_len);                                        \
00072         string _prefix_id (prefix_id, prefix_id_len);                   \
00073         _ba->f_name(_id, _prefix_id, strategy, str_opt, str_opt_len);   \
00074     }
00075 
00076 #define _XX_BA_FUNC_DEF_DATA(ba_prefix, ba_type, f_name)                \
00077     extern "C" _XX_BA_FUNC_DECL_DATA(ba_prefix, f_name) {               \
00078         ba_type *_ba = (ba_type *)ba->instance;                         \
00079         string _id (id, id_len);                                        \
00080         _ba->f_name(_id, strategy, str_opt, str_opt_len, data, data_len); \
00081     }
00082 
00083 #define _BA_FUNC_DEF(f_name)  _XX_BA_FUNC_DEF(ba, Blackadder, f_name)
00084 #define _BA_FUNC_DEF_DATA(f_name)  _XX_BA_FUNC_DEF_DATA(ba, Blackadder, f_name)
00085 
00086 struct _ba_handle {
00087     Blackadder *instance;
00088 };
00089 #endif /* __cplusplus */
00090 
00091 /*
00092  * Blackadder pub/sub functions.
00093  */
00094 _BA_FUNC_DECL(publish_scope);
00095 _BA_FUNC_DECL(publish_info);
00096 _BA_FUNC_DECL(unpublish_scope);
00097 _BA_FUNC_DECL(unpublish_info);
00098 _BA_FUNC_DECL(subscribe_scope);
00099 _BA_FUNC_DECL(subscribe_info);
00100 _BA_FUNC_DECL(unsubscribe_scope);
00101 _BA_FUNC_DECL(unsubscribe_info);
00102 
00103 _BA_FUNC_DECL_DATA(publish_data);
00104 
00105 /*
00106  * Other Blackadder instance functions.
00107  */
00108 ba_handle ba_instance(int user_space);
00109 void ba_delete(ba_handle ba);
00110 void ba_disconnect(ba_handle ba);
00111 
00112 void ba_get_event(ba_handle ba, ba_event ev);
00113 
00114 /*
00115  * Accessor functions for the Event class.
00116  */
00117 ba_event ba_event_new(void);
00118 void ba_event_delete(ba_event ev);
00119 void ba_event_type(ba_event ev, unsigned char **type);
00120 void ba_event_id(ba_event ev, const char **id, unsigned int *id_len);
00121 void ba_event_data(ba_event ev, void **data, unsigned int **data_len);

00123 #endif /* BLACKADDER_H */
